TopicTitle: I feel like the killer of threads.

Articles.Content:
I seem to have killed off the games forum...somehow. Any thread I post in ceases all activity for hours on end. Now...how can I use these powers for my own benifit...

Anyone else have this promblem/percieved issue?
Well, I was going to post in this thread, but then Rage097 killed it.

You're so kind, y'know?

Edited September 10, 2013 by Rage097

Hey, I'm desperate. Any post in response to mine is good in my book. even a warning...well...Okay not as much a negative response, but you get my point.

And unless something changed in the months I have been away A very miniscule amount of funny gifs/images is allowed. as long as one person isn't posting too many (more than like 3 in a row through out an hour or something *shrug*)

Yup. I turned the Games Forum into a ghost town xD

I'm obviously cursed.

Yep your cursed. In fact your so cursed that it renders other curses null and void.

If you want to take that as a good thing then go for it.
you seem to be getting replies enough in this thread

Stop acting like getting attention on the forum is super imporant. Nobody likes talking to an attention whale, and nobody wants to be around one. It's as simple as that. Also yeah, don't post reaction images.

Stop acting like getting attention on the forum is super imporant. Nobody likes talking to an attention whale, and nobody wants to be around one. It's as simple as that. Also yeah, don't post reaction images.

aight, can do.

Alright guys, I'm not really seeing the use of this thread, and it's already starting to get some people angry and to derail, so we'll end it here.

/thread
